pageProps.toc: [{"url":"#","text":"Overview","depth":2},{"url":"#flat-data","depth":2,"text":"一维数据/列表数据 "},{"url":"#hierarchical-data","depth":2,"text":"层级数据 "}]
pageProps.content:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["AntV Infographic 的数据配置既简单又灵活，内置支持",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"一维数据"}],"与",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"层级数据"}],"，并预留扩展空间；后续会补充对",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"关系数据"}],"等复杂结构的支持。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"数据类型定义："}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"export interface Data {
  title?: string;
  desc?: string;
  items: ItemDatum[];
  [key: string]: any;
}

export interface ItemDatum {
  icon?: string | ResourceConfig;
  label?: string;
  desc?: string;
  value?: number;
  illus?: string | ResourceConfig;
  children?: ItemDatum[];
  [key: string]: any;
}
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"Data"}]," 包含标题、描述、数据项列表，并允许扩展字段；",["$r","code",null,{"children":"ItemDatum"}]," 支持图标、标题、描述、数值、插图、子项等字段，同样可扩展。完整说明见 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#data","children":"Data"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"flat-data","children":"一维数据/列表数据 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"一维数据示例："}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title 信息图标题
  desc 这是信息图的描述文本
  items
    - icon https://example.com/icon1.svg
      label 数据项 1
      desc 这是数据项 1 的描述
    - icon https://example.com/icon2.svg
      label 数据项 2
      desc 这是数据项 2 的描述
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"hierarchical-data","children":"层级数据 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["层级数据可通过 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"children"}]," 递归嵌套："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title 信息图标题
  desc 这是信息图的描述文本
  items
    - label 一级数据项 1
      children
        - label 二级数据项 1-1
        - label 二级数据项 1-2
    - label 一级数据项 2
      children
        - label 二级数据项 2-1
"}]}],"
",["$r","Note",null,{"children":[["$r","h4",null,{"id":"数据使用请注意以下事项","children":"数据使用请注意以下事项： "}],["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["结构/数据项未必消费全部字段；缺失必需字段可能影响渲染，使用前请查阅",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/built-in-structures","children":"结构"}],"与",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/built-in-items","children":"数据项"}],"说明"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"扩展字段需在自定义结构或数据项中手动访问并映射"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["使用资源字段前请阅读",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/resources","children":"资源"}]]}],"
"]}]]}]]}]]
pageProps.contentEn:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["AntV Infographic’s data configuration is both simple and flexible, with built-in support for ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"one-dimensional data"}]," and ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"hierarchical data"}],", with room for extension. Support for ",["$r","strong",null,{"children":"relational data"}]," and other complex structures will be added in the future."]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"Data type definitions:"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-ts","children":"export interface Data {
  title?: string;
  desc?: string;
  items: ItemDatum[];
  [key: string]: any;
}

export interface ItemDatum {
  icon?: string | ResourceConfig;
  label?: string;
  desc?: string;
  value?: number;
  illus?: string | ResourceConfig;
  children?: ItemDatum[];
  [key: string]: any;
}
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":[["$r","code",null,{"children":"Data"}]," includes title, description, and item list, allowing for extended fields; ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"ItemDatum"}]," supports icon, label, description, value, illustration, children, and other fields, also extensible. See ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#data","children":"Data"}]," for complete specifications."]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"flat-data","children":"One-dimensional Data / List Data "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"One-dimensional data example:"}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title Infographic Title
  desc This is the description text of the infographic
  items
    - icon https://example.com/icon1.svg
      label Data Item 1
      desc This is the description of data item 1
    - icon https://example.com/icon2.svg
      label Data Item 2
      desc This is the description of data item 2
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"hierarchical-data","children":"Hierarchical Data "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Hierarchical data can be recursively nested through ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"children"}],":"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  title Infographic Title
  desc This is the description text of the infographic
  items
    - label Level 1 Item 1
      children
        - label Level 2 Item 1-1
        - label Level 2 Item 1-2
    - label Level 1 Item 2
      children
        - label Level 2 Item 2-1
"}]}],"
",["$r","Note",null,{"children":[["$r","h4",null,{"id":"please-note-the-following-when-using-data","children":"Please note the following when using data: "}],["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Structures/items may not consume all fields; missing required fields may affect rendering. Please consult ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/built-in-structures","children":"structures"}]," and ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/built-in-items","children":"items"}]," documentation before use"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":"Extended fields need to be manually accessed and mapped in custom structures or items"}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["Please read ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/resources","children":"Resources"}]," before using resource fields"]}],"
"]}]]}]]}]]
